title.narrative: Sminamento e Disabilità in Afghanistan - Sostegno all'appello speciale 2018
Support to "Special Appeal 2018 - Disability and Mine Action"

description.narrative: Migliorare i servizi sanitari a favore di malati e feriti, incluse le vittime da mine e/o altri ordigni esplosivi, nonché migliorare la mobilità, l'accesso ai servizi e la capacità di reinserimento sociale ed economico a favore delle persone colpite da disabilità. L'iniziativa sostiene l'Appello Speciale del CICR per disabilità e mine e potrà sostenere le attività previste dal Programma di Riabilitazione Fisica e Reinserimento Sociale del CICR (PRP-Orthopaedic Program), sviluppato nei 7 centri di Kabul, Mazar-e-Sharif, Herat, Jalalabad, Gulbahar, Faizabad e Lashkar Gah.

The contribution will support physical rehabilitation centres in Afghanistan. This will enable people with disabilities to continue having access to good-quality treatment and/or devices at ICRC-run physical rehabilitation centres or, for those in remote areas, through outreach activities. Housebound patients will receive assistance to ease their living conditions. The ICRC will facilitate disabled patients' social reintegration through sports and by supporting their pursuits of livelihoods and education. It will help making physical rehabilitation services throughout the country more sustainable - by helping service providers and national health agencies to improve their ability to deliver such services, and by gradually handing over the management of facilities to local staff.
